tool_description: Coins, NFTS, Portfolio tracker, Whales, airdrops, news, tweets, YT videos, reddit posts, DeFi protocols,, games, podcasts, events, gas price and more!
name: 🔥 All-In-One Crypto Swiss Knife 🚀
title: 🔥 All-In-One Crypto Swiss Knife 🚀

api_list.name: Top coins by market cap
api_list.description: Get top coins by mCap

api_list.name: News
api_list.description: get crypto news

api_list.name: Podcasts
api_list.description: get crypto podcasts

api_list.name: Gas price
api_list.description: get current ETH gas price
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-in-one-crypto-swiss-knife.p.rapidapi.com/gas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-in-one-crypto-swiss-knife.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Reddit
api_list.description:
Get top latest crypto posts from Reddit from any subreddit.
name= subreddit name from reddit url
Example: https://www.reddit.com/r/dogecoin/

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Subreddit name from url. Example: https://www.reddit.com/r/dogecoin/

api_list.name: Twitter
api_list.description: Get crypto tweets by curated authors

api_list.name: Youtube videos
api_list.description:
Get videos.
By default returns videos with 'crypto' keyword but  you can search for any keyword

api_list.description: Get latest whale activities.

api_list.description: Get biggest whale addresses

api_list.description: Get crypto upcoming  events grouped by dates

api_list.name: Projects / Staking/ Other Activities
api_list.description: Get activities that address is involved in

api_list.description: Get list of NFTs that address holds.

api_list.name: Net worth history (sparklines)
api_list.description:
Get sparklines with address net worth for chart rendering.
Returns array of objects with timestamp and USD value

api_list.name: Address transaction history
api_list.description:
Get transaction history of any address.
Supported chains:     "eth, bsc, matic, avax, okt, hmy, heco, klay, op, arb, ftm, xdai, cro, mobm, celo, aurora, fuse, evmos, cfx, kava";

get balance of any address.

optional_parameters.name: chain_id
optional_parameters.description:
Supported chains:  \"eth, bsc, matic, avax, okt, hmy, heco, klay, op, arb, ftm, xdai, cro, mobm, celo, aurora, fuse, evmos, cfx, kava\";

Leave empty for all protocols

api_list.description: Get list of tokenless protocols that may airdrop soon

import requests

url = "https://all-in-one-crypto-swiss-knife.p.rapidapi.com/airdrops/potential"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-in-one-crypto-swiss-knife.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
